member.name: T:Epicor.Mfg.BO.PartBinSearch
member.summary: Client side business object for PartBinSearch.

member.name: T:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl
member.summary: Searches plants, warehouses, and part bins based on input parameters. PartOnHandWhse was used as a template.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl.CheckBin(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Validate the bin and warehouse for the current plant..
member.param: The Warehouse.
The Bin.
Blank if no error. Otherwise error message.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl.GetBinContents(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a listing of parts in a particular whse/bin.
member.param: The Warehouse is required.
A specific Bin. Required.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl.GetFullBinSearch(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the dataset of bins, in difference with GetPartBinSearch, this one includes All bins whether they have a dimension or lot number or neither of both.
member.param: Part number.
The Warehouse can be for a specific warehouse or null for all warehouses.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl.GetPartBinByLot(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the warehouse/bin information for a specific lot.
member.param: Part number. Required.
The Lot number. Required.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl.GetPartBinSearch(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Gets the dataset of warehouses and bins for a Part. If a change is made to this method the same change should be applied to the GetSpecificBinSearch method.
member.param: Part number.
The Warehouse can be for a specific warehouse or null for all warehouses.
The Lot number can be for a specific lot if null is passed, only bins with no lot number will be returned .
The UOM Code can be for a specific Unite of Measure code if null is passed, only bins with no UOM codes will be returned.
True or False. False will search for bins with a qty ne 0. True will return all bins for a warehouse.
If a starting bin is to be used.
If a specific type of bin is to be used.
If a specific vendorNum for a managed bin is to be used.
Page size.
Absolute page.
More pages.

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl.GetPartXRefInfo(System.String@,System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: This method defaults PartAdvisor fields when the PartNum field changes
member.param: Proposed PartNumber change
RowID of the selected record. Skips find part logic if this has a value.
RowType of the selected record. Only used with sysRowID.
Warning message if the InvTransfer line contains serial numbers
If the part is being changed to something different than what was on the order, ask if the user wants to continue
Multiple matches were found by FindPart

member.name: M:Epicor.Mfg.Proxy.PartBinSearchImpl.GetSpecificBinSearch(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the dataset of warehouses and bins for a Part. If a change is made to this method the same change should be applied to the GetPartBinSearch method.
member.param: Part number. Required
The Warehouse can be for a specific warehouse or null for all.
The Lot number can be for a specific lot if null is passed, only bins with no lot number will be returned.
The UOM Code can be for a specific Unit of Measure code if null is passed, only bins with no UOM codes will be returned.
True or False. False will search for bins with a qty ne 0. True will return all bins for a warehouse.
A specific Bin. Required.
